definition: ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people
surname Shao/name of an ancient state that existed in what is now Shaanxi Province
to call together/to summon/to convene/temple or monastery (used in place names in Inner Mongolia)
to have the power to rally supporters

sentences.english: Prioritize content and call-to-action elements over everything else.
sentences.chinese: 主要內容和號召行爲優先於其他所有事情的。

sentences.english: You don't choose five permanents you control until Clarion Ultimatum resolves.
sentences.chinese: 結算號召通牒時，你才需要選擇五個永久物。

sentences.english: The general's speech was pitched as a call to arms.
sentences.chinese: 將軍的講話是一個要大家拿起武器的號召。

sentences.english: But still, you can't called on all of female compatriots give priority on fatties.
sentences.chinese: 但不能號召全體女同胞把對象優先放在胖子身上。

sentences.english: House Orien calls upon swiftblades to defend the house's interests with weapon and word.
sentences.chinese: 歐瑞恩家族號召快刃們用武器與言語守護家族的利益。

sentences.english: There was a quick response to the call of Bayin Naung.
sentences.chinese: 勃應囊的號召得到了迅速的響應。

sentences.english: The flood control headquarters has urged local governments to step up efforts to fight the floods.
sentences.chinese: 防洪抗旱總指揮部辦公室號召當地政府全力抗洪。

sentences.english: School districts read its recommendations as a call to reject rote learning.
sentences.chinese: 學校團體將其中的建議認爲是反對機械式學習的號召。

sentences.english: Several proposals call for every nuclear country to join in.
sentences.chinese: 有幾項建議號召每個核國家都加入進來。

sentences.english: To expand its appeal, Samsung is opening an app store.
sentences.chinese: 爲了擴大其號召力，三星的應用商店正在開張。

sentences.english: But Assad shows no sign of heeding their calls for him to step down.
sentences.chinese: 但是沒有跡象顯示阿薩德會響應他們的號召下臺。

sentences.english: Neighbors who were at war would call a truce to participate in the games.
sentences.chinese: 那些在戰爭中的鄰國都會號召暫時休兵以參加運動會。

sentences.english: An online contest challenged people to work "Myfather is Li Gang" into classical poetry.
sentences.chinese: 一個帖子號召人們把“我爸是李剛”組合進古詩中。

sentences.english: The UN has called on both sides to observe the ceasefire.
sentences.chinese: 聯合國號召交戰雙方遵守停火協定。

sentences.english: That slogan is simply a call for conscious reflection on national unity.
sentences.chinese: 這一口號僅僅是號召人民提高民族團結的覺悟。

sentences.english: He and his team are calling for a world-wide worldwide ban on lead-based paint.
sentences.chinese: 他和他的團隊在號召全世界禁止含鉛塗料。

definition: to originate/to initiate/to launch (an attack, an initiative etc)/to start/to propose sth (for the first time)
to extend/to spread/to popularize/generalization/promotion (of a product etc)
care/solicitude/to show care for/concerned about/attentive to
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
